Guardrail: Check for separation of duties regarding managing the key and cryptographic usage of the key.
Rationale: Maintaining separation of duties for sensitive and confidential data for key management and cryptographic key usage helps reduce the risk of unauthorized administrative access to the data. In addition, having a dedicated cryptographic key usage role helps reduce the risk of accidental management misconfiguration to the keys.
Remediation: Check that the key administrator and cryptographic key usage role maintain separate IAM actions for admin and usage. Examplekey admin hereandkey user here.
